title: Report: Pixel 7a will cost $499, Pixel 6a will continue at a reduced price
description: With an upgraded screen, cameras, and wireless charging, Google wants $50 more.

title: Adobe teases generative AI video tools
description: "Firefly for Video" will generate sound effects and music, edit footage via text.

title: FBI: Rent-a-Hitman site nabbed Air National Guardsman who was “excited” to kill
description: FBI: Guardsman owned AR-15 and was willing to take fingers and ears as trophies.

title: Science confirms it: The best kimchi is made in traditional clay jars (onggi)
description: Onggi have just the right amount of porosity to enable kimchi to ferment faster.

title: Discord flushes leaked docs, reposters after leading FBI to prime suspect
description: Discord-leaks suspect used security clearance to track investigation, FBI says.

title: Apple launches high-yield savings account with 4.15 percent APY
description: Apple expands financial services push as the hardware market remains tumultuous.

title: Pacific garbage patch providing a deep ocean home for coastal species
description: Floating plastic is forming its own ecosystems with mixes of species.

title: These 10 EVs and plug-in hybrids still get the full $7,500 tax credit
description: Seven others qualify for a $3,500 tax credit.

title: Panic at Google: Samsung considers dumping search for Bing and ChatGPT
description: The New York Times details Google's "shock" and "panic" at having a search rival.

title: FSF: Chrome’s JPEG XL killing shows how the web works under browser hegemony
description: Google, with 80% of browser share, says there's not enough ecosystem interest.

title: Report: 15-inch MacBook Air coming at WWDC, new Mac Studios will arrive eventually
description: We haven't heard much about the Mac Studio since its debut last year.

title: Bungie takes aim at Destiny 2 cheaters using “third-party peripherals”
description: Accessibility devices are still OK to use "where a player could not play otherwise."

title: The VW ID.7—a new electric motor and a streamlined sedan shape
description: Is the sedan having a comeback? This one arrives in the US in 2024.

title: Sega Sammy launches $772 million offer for Angry Birds-maker Rovio
description: Japanese games maker’s bid values Finnish group at almost 20% below price it went public.

title: iSIM vs eSIM vs SIM: The constantly shrinking ways carriers ID your phone
description: The death of physical SIM cards is quickly approaching. These are the alternatives.
